Isn't riot concerned like people who have been playing league for quite a while would have probably MAYBE made smurf accounts or even multiple smurf accounts and they would get loads of IP which would be would be a bit unfair???.......??????

Bring a Mate / Refer a Friend is a system that has been iterated a couple of times now in other regions, and the version launched today for Oceania takes into account a lot of these concerns about potential abuse.

The TL;DR is that the majority of people refer 5 or fewer friends, and Bring a Mate will only give out rewards up to that level, that's a maximum of 5000 IP.  

There is a good post explaining some of the previous concerns people had with Refer a Friend on other regions in detail [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/upcoming-changes-refer-friend)

You only get rewarded for new accounts created through your referral link, so for people to abuse the system they would have to create new accounts and level them to 10 to receive the rewards. Riot have already considered people would do this and expressly forbid it in the terms and conditions, and they have checks in place to help detect such fraudulent action and have punished people who abuse the system in the past. So they are definitely concerned that people will try to abuse the system but ultimately find it an acceptable risk to take.

It says I have 0 refferals but i have a few of my friends refer me before, it said that they couldnt find my name on oce but on na they could(This was when I was named Lollypowder) because I have changed my summoner name, would the refferals transfer? and also i didn't receive any rewards prior this happening even though my friends have hit 20-30.

Bring a Mate on this server won't show your previous referrals from other servers.  Everyone starts from 0.

That said, we did identify accounts who had previously been referring friends before they moved to Oceania, and gave them appropriate rewards.  Check your IP balance, as you might have received this already.
